text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump The U.S. now leads the world with the highest number of cases, highest number of deaths, and highest growth rate of new cases. His "leadership":

They called it a hoax.

We saw it. 

We've got the tapes. 

#TrumpLiesPeopleDie 

#FoxNewsLiedAsPeopleDied 

https://t.co/PzdHbHFA38
